alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills and the Diablo Range; East Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued February 22 at 2:38AM PST until February 25 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM WEDNESDAY TO 9 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Widespread areas of sub-freezing temperatures in the overnight and early morning hours. * WHERE...East Bay Interior Valleys and East Bay Hills and the Diablo Range. * WHEN...From 2 AM Wednesday to 9 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills and the Diablo Range; East Bay Interior Valleys
